table_caption: Descriptive statistics and group differences of markers of neurodegeneration, and global properties of gray matter and white matter controlling for age, gender, education and white matter hypointensities.
table_foot: Mean ± standard deviation. Group differences are controlled for age, gender and white matter hypointensity volume. ANCOVA, analysis of covariance. FDG-PET, fludeoxyglucose positron emission tomography. GM, gray matter. WM, white matter. FA, fractional anisotropy. MD, mean diffusivity.
